text: Percy Robert Miller, also known by his stage name Master P, is an American rapper, record producer, entrepreneur, investor, businessman, former basketball player and actor from New Orleans, Louisiana. He is known for his work on No Limit Records. His single “Make ‘Em Say Uhh!,” which went platinum. title: Master P
